title: Riot, I have a bone to pick with you...
body:
So I recently purchased merch from your store, and while I am over the moon for my Poro's (they are beyond adorable!), I am not happy with my DJ Sona shirt. I ordered the large Women's style, and I have to say, this says LARGE but it's a damned small. It's so tight and the arms are so constricting and it keeps rolling up. Like, this is why women have such horrible self-confidence. Like, I am not a tiny woman, but I'm not obese. You name things as large, but it's 2-3 sizes smaller than an actual large. This is upsetting because I am not a huge person, but if you force me to order, in your sizes, a 2x just for the shirt to fit me properly, that just absolutely shits on my self-confidence and many others. 

So this is a formal complaint: Fix your damned sizes. They are ridiculous. A large should be a large, not a small with an L on the tag.

replies.body: Yikes that's no good! It doesn't make much sense to have a shirt that seems to have been sized incorrectly. Reach out to our merchandise agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to get that all straightened out for you!
Arent most clothing lines undersized to make the smallest women feel superior? I thought this was standard.
